sourcesContent:
import css from './profile.module.css'; import PropTypes from 'prop-types' export const Profile = ({ username, tag, location, avatar, stats }) => { return

{username}

@{tag}

{location}

  • Followers {stats.followers}
  • Views {stats.views}
  • Likes {stats.likes}
} Profile.propTypes = { username: PropTypes.string.isRequired, tag: PropTypes.string.isRequired, location: PropTypes.string.isRequired, avatar: PropTypes.number.isRequired, }
